attributes.action: go to Selly Oak hospital and see how the brave soldiers are returning back from Afghanistan after being involved in an IED Explosion,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this will hopefully make him realise the urgency for better kit and also to make him realise we should NOT be there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
